inputsClass.name: autoClose
inputsClass.rawdescription: Defines, if the dropdown should close automatically after user interaction.
inputsClass.description: Defines, if the dropdown should close automatically after user interaction.

inputsClass.name: canDeselect
inputsClass.rawdescription: Allows the user to deselect an item.
inputsClass.description: Allows the user to deselect an item.

inputsClass.name: canSelectWithSpace
inputsClass.rawdescription: If enabled, an item can be selected with the space key.
inputsClass.description: If enabled, an item can be selected with the space key.

inputsClass.name: container
inputsClass.rawdescription: The container to put the dropdown to. Defaults to body.
inputsClass.description: The container to put the dropdown to. Defaults to body.

inputsClass.name: disabled
inputsClass.rawdescription: If set to true, the select is disabled.
inputsClass.description: If set to true, the select is disabled.

inputsClass.name: icon
inputsClass.rawdescription: The icon to be displayed in the select.
inputsClass.description: The icon to be displayed in the select.

inputsClass.name: insideClick
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Defines if the dropdown should stay open when the user clicks inside the select.
If set to true, the dropdown will only close when the user clicks outside the select.
inputsClass.description: Defines if the dropdown should stay open when the user clicks inside the select. If set to true, the dropdown will only close when the user clicks outside the select.

inputsClass.name: items

jsdoctags.comment:
Example :

<c8y-select [items]="[{ label: 'Item 1', value: 'item1' }, { label: 'Item 2', value: 'item2' }]"></c8y-select>

Example :

<c8y-select [items]="['Item 1', 'Item 2', 'Item 3']"></c8y-select>

For more complex scenarios, you can use content-projection:

Example :

<c8y-select>
   <i [c8yIcon]="'rocket'" class="text-16" *c8ySelectItem="'rocket'; label: 'Rocket'"></i>
   <i [c8yIcon]="'car'" class="text-16" *c8ySelectItem="'car'; label: 'Car'"></i>
</c8y-select>

inputsClass.rawdescription: Items to be displayed in the select. Can be an array of strings or an array of objects with `label` and `value` properties. ```html ```html ``` ``` ```html ```html ``` ``` For more complex scenarios, you can use content-projection: ```html ```html ``` ```
inputsClass.description:
Items to be displayed in the select. Can be an array of strings or an array of objects with label and value properties.

Example :
```html
<c8y-select [items]="[{ label: 'Item 1', value: 'item1' }, { label: 'Item 2', value: 'item2' }]"></c8y-select>
Example :
```html
```html
<c8y-select [items]="['Item 1', 'Item 2', 'Item 3']"></c8y-select>
Example :
For more complex scenarios, you can use content-projection:

```html
```html
<c8y-select>
   <i [c8yIcon]="'rocket'" class="text-16" *c8ySelectItem="'rocket'; label: 'Rocket'"></i>
   <i [c8yIcon]="'car'" class="text-16" *c8ySelectItem="'car'; label: 'Car'"></i>
</c8y-select>
Example :

inputsClass.name: multi
inputsClass.rawdescription: If set to true, the user can select multiple items.
inputsClass.description: If set to true, the user can select multiple items.

inputsClass.name: name
inputsClass.rawdescription: The name used for this select.

inputsClass.name: placeholder
inputsClass.rawdescription: Placeholder text to be displayed in the select.
inputsClass.description: Placeholder text to be displayed in the select.

outputsClass.name: onDeselect
outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits if a item was deselected.

outputsClass.name: onIconClick
outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits when the select icon is clicked.
outputsClass.description: Emits when the select icon is clicked.

outputsClass.name: onSelect
outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits if a item is selected.

propertiesClass.name: searchHasFocus
propertiesClass.description: Indicates if the search input has focus.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Indicates if the search input has focus.

getSignature.name: preselectedItem
getSignature.rawdescription: A item which is preselected. It is used when a user types in the search input to give a visual typeahead feedback.
